headline: Buy This Stock to Own a Piece of Ferrari. It’s a Low-Risk Bet for Value Seekers.
summary: Exor owns stakes in a group of public and private companies, notably a nearly 20% stake in Ferrari, the top luxury car maker in the world. Its shares look cheap.
